alert.note: Alert for Assumption; Eastern Ascension; Southern Livingston; St. James; Western Ascension (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 10 at 4:51PM CDT by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Ascension, northern St. James, south central Livingston and northeastern Assumption Parishes through 515 PM CDT... At 450 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Sorrento, or near Gonzales, moving south at 5 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Gonzales, Donaldsonville, Lutcher, Sorrento, French Settlement, Port Vincent and Geismar. This includes Interstate 10 in Louisiana between mile markers 174 and 193. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Assumption; Eastern Ascension; Southern Livingston; St. James; Western Ascension
